text: Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ pariññeyya nti me bhikkhave pubbe pe udapādi
edit: Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ pariññeyya nti me bhikkhave pubbe pe udapādi

translations.transtext: Monks, that vision, insight, wisdom, knowledge, [and] light arose to me in the teaching never heard before thus, "This suffering as a noble truth should be well understood."
